title: Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue miss In Q3
text:
© Reuters. Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue miss In Q3

Investing.com - Caterpillar (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that missed analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that fell short of forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $2.66 on revenue of $12.76B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $2.91 on revenue of $13.43B. That compared to EPS of $2.86 on revenue of $13.51B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $2.83 on revenue of $14.43B in the previous quarter.

For the year, Caterpillar shares are up 5.21%, under-performing the S&P Global (NYSE: ) 100 which is up 17.17% year to date.

Caterpillar follows other major Capital Goods sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, United Technologies reported third quarter EPS of $2.21 on revenue of $19.5B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.03 on revenue of $19.32B.

Honeywell earnings beat analyst's expectations on Thursday, October 17, 2019, with third quarter EPS of $2.08 on revenue of $9.09B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $2.01 on revenue of $9.12B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue miss In Q3
